Row.Text: "The city's wall I established firm as the mountains, and peoples of the land which my hands had conquered, I settled therein."
"You, O Ashur, hold all knowledge from the ancient past to the distant future."
"I led my armies from one end of the earth to the other and brought into submission all princes of the four quarters."
